item.title: My First Post
item.description: Hi, everyone! If you came here you are probably thinking about hire me, follow and support my work or just stalking… No matter what reason, you came to the right place. This is my personal website, where I plan do share some of my work, projects I’ve been to and my passions: bycicles, tech and books! This site is not supposed to be updated regularly, whenever I feel I should update it, I will.
